text: Santa Cruz Futebol Clube is a Brazilian football club based in Recife, Pernambuco. ==Achievements== *Campeonato Brasileiro Série C: 1 ::2013 *Campeonato Pernambucano (Pernambuco State Championship): 27 ::1931, 1932, 1933, 1935, 1940, 1946, 1947, 1957, 1959, 1969, 1970, 1971, 1972, 1973, 1976, 1978, 1979, 1983, 1986, 1987, 1990, 1993, 1995, 2005, 2011, 2012, 2013 *Copa Pernambuco: 4 ::2008, 2009, 2010, 2012 *Supercampeonato Pernambucano (Pernambuco Superchampionship): 3 ::1957, 1976, 1983 *Torneio Início de Pernambuco (Pernambuco Start Tournament): 12 ::1919, 1926, 1937, 1939, 1946, 1947, 1954, 1956, 1969, 1971, 1972, 1976 Category:Brazilian football clubs Category:Recife Category:1914 establishments in Brazil
title: Santa Cruz Futebol Clube
